info.name: 7. NHSBSA Prescriber Endorsements
info.description:
Page 41 - EPS Prescribing Systems Compliance Spec 

6.4.4 The System must ensure that any required prescribing endorsements
are included within the electronic prescription message. Endorsement
codes are listed within the NHSBSA document “Requirements and
Guidance for Endorsement”.


Validation question - Can the values be different as the Endorsement has different values throughout the message

exec: console.log("Endorsement Section - NHSBSA Prescription Endorsement - Value is Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances (ACBS) .");
pm.test("Body matches and contains pertinentPrescriberEndorsement", function () {
pm.test("Value returned in pertinentPrescriberEndorsement is Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances  'ACBS' (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation3 > pertinentPrescriberEndorsement > value').attr('code');

request.description: Prescriptions for products recommended by the Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances.

exec: console.log("Endorsement Section - NHSBSA Prescription Endorsement - Value is Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances (ACBS) .");
pm.test("Body matches and contains pertinentPrescriberEndorsement", function () {
pm.test("Value returned in pertinentPrescriberEndorsement is Contraceptive 'CC' (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation3 > pertinentPrescriberEndorsement > value').attr('code');

request.description: A drug used for contraceptive purposes which is not listed in Part XVI Section 10 must be endorsed with the female symbol or equivalent

exec: console.log("Endorsement Section - NHSBSA Prescription Endorsement - Value is Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances (ACBS) .");
pm.test("Body matches and contains pertinentPrescriberEndorsement", function () {
pm.test("Value returned in pertinentPrescriberEndorsement is Food replacement/food supplement products 'AF' (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation3 > pertinentPrescriberEndorsement > value').attr('code');

request.description: Prescriptions for food replacement/food supplement products available in a variety of flavours

exec: console.log("Endorsement Section - NHSBSA Prescription Endorsement - Value is Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances (ACBS) .");
pm.test("Body matches and contains pertinentPrescriberEndorsement", function () {
pm.test("Value returned in pertinentPrescriberEndorsement is Selected List Scheme 'SLS' (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation3 > pertinentPrescriberEndorsement > value').attr('code');

request.description: Drugs and appliances to be prescribed in certain circumstances under the NHS Pharmaceutical Services. The prescriber must endorse the prescription with the reference 'SLS'.

exec: console.log("Endorsement Section - NHSBSA Prescription Endorsement - Value is Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances (ACBS) .");
pm.test("Body matches and contains pertinentPrescriberEndorsement", function () {
pm.test("Value returned in pertinentPrescriberEndorsement is Sexual Health 'FS' (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation3 > pertinentPrescriberEndorsement > value').attr('code');

request.description: Any item prescribed for the treatment of an STI must be endorsed with FS by the prescriber in order not to attract a prescription charge
